snippet.title: Arcade Game: Xevious (1982 Namco)
snippet.description:
A flying vertical shooting game. 
This is the first game to have pre-rendered graphics and the first game to have hidden characters.

A flying vertical shooting game. 
This is the first game to have pre-rendered graphics and the first game to have hidden characters.
